name: UNCANNY (itch)
description:
You must collect all items in order to escape.
But you are not alone...

I had an idea based around making a cursed game about Mr.Incredible becoming uncanny, and I deeply regret making this.

----------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY:

Use WASD to move.
Press L-shift to run.
Press E to pick up items.
Press Left click to turn on/ off your flashlight.
